titles: Sathans sowing season. By William Est minister and preacher of Gods word in Bydeford.
author: Est, William, 1546 or 7-1625.
Est, William, 1546 or 7-1625. Mirrour of mercy.
publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes for Richard Bonian, and are to bee sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Floure de Luce,
notes: Signatures: A-F8, G4 (first and last leaves blank?).
